Interface ec.meta.Cla

public interface interface Cla
extends Obj
This is the approved replacement interface for Class.

getArrayCla()
Get the Cla object representing an array of objects of this type.
getMethod(String)
Get the method with the given signature for this class.
isInstance(Object)
Return true if the given object is an instance of this class.

isInstance 
 public abstract boolean isInstance(Object obj)
Return true if the given object is an instance of this class.

Parameters:
obj - the object in question
Returns:
true if the given object is an instance of this class
getArrayCla 
 public abstract Cla getArrayCla()
Get the Cla object representing an array of objects of this type.

Returns:
the array Cla
getMethod 
 public abstract Method getMethod(String sig)
Get the method with the given signature for this class. See MethodDescriptor for a description of signatures, but note that the signature here does not include the "className:" prefix (it's implicit).

Parameters:
sig - the signature
Returns:
the method
